tool_description: This project presents a method to capture detailed information from Spotify albums, with a special emphasis on obtaining stream counts for tracks—a feature not supported by Spotify's official API.
name: Spotify with Stream Count
title: Spotify with Stream Count

api_list.name: Fetch Album Data with streams count
api_list.description: Fetch Album Id with streams count
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-with-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com/api/album/0m3d0k9KLSQoZAITc71SVn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-with-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-with-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com/api/album/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-with-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
